item.title: 受益于人工智能需求，台积电第四季度营收大幅超出市场预期
item.description: 全球最大的合约芯片制造商台积电周五公布的第四季度财报显示，由于人工智能需求的推动，该公司第四季度营收轻松超过市场预期，并达到了自己的预期。【原文：TSMC , the world's largest contract chipmaker, reported on Friday fourth-quarter revenue that easily beat market forecasts and hit its own expectations as it reaped the benefit of artificial intelligence demand.】

item.title: 早间竞价迫在眉睫的非农就业让债券熊如饥似渴
item.description: Stella Qiu 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Stella Qiu】

item.description: 一年的变化真大。【原文：What a difference a year makes.】

item.title: 美国 12 月就业增长缓慢而稳定
item.description: 12 月份，美国的就业增长可能放缓至一个仍然健康的水平，而失业率则稳定在 4.2%，这强化了美联储今年降息的谨慎态度。【原文：U.S. job growth likely slowed to a still-healthy clip in December while the unemployment rate held steady at 4.2%, reinforcing the Federal Reserve's cautious approach toward interest rate cuts this year.】

item.title: 英伟达批评拜登报告中的人工智能芯片出口限制计划
item.description: 据报道，乔-拜登（Joe Biden）政府计划对人工智能芯片出口施加新的限制，英伟达（Nvidia）周四对此提出批评，称即将卸任的美国领导人不应 "抢在即将上任的特朗普总统之前 "在最后一刻颁布政策。【原文：Nvidia on Thursday criticized a reported plan by the Joe Biden administration to impose new restrictions on AI chip exports, saying that the outgoing U.S. leader should not "preempt incoming President Trump" by enacting a last-minute policy.】

item.title: 彭博社称，阿波罗考虑出资 95 亿美元收购 Seven & i 公司
item.description: 彭博新闻社周五援引多位知情人士的话称，阿波罗全球管理公司正在考虑投资高达 1.5 万亿日元（95 亿美元）对日本 Seven & i 控股公司进行管理层收购。【原文：Apollo Global Management is considering investing as much as 1.5 trillion yen ($9.5 billion) in a management buyout of Japan's Seven & i Holdings , Bloomberg News said on Friday, citing several people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 野村聘请 Sudhir Nemali 担任国际财富首席运营官
item.description: 根据路透社周五看到的一份内部备忘录，日本野村控股公司已任命 Sudhir Nemali 为其国际财富管理业务的董事总经理兼首席运营官。【原文：Japan's Nomura Holdings has appointed Sudhir Nemali as managing director and chief operating officer of its international wealth management business, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 中国 12 月出口可能在关税不确定性之前获得增长势头
item.description: 中国12月份的出口可能以更快的速度增长，这表明在美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普本月重返白宫和新的贸易风险到来之前，生产商竞相将库存转移到主要市场。【原文：China's exports probably expanded at a faster pace in December, suggesting producers raced to move inventory to major markets ahead of U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's return to the White House this month and fresh trade risks.】

item.title: 特鲁多在会见美国商界领袖时批评特朗普的关税提议
item.description: 加拿大总理贾斯汀-特鲁多周四在与美国商界领袖会面时批评了当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提出的美国对加拿大产品征收关税的建议，称这一举措将对两国产生 "负面影响"。【原文：Prime Minister Justin Trudeau criticized President-elect Donald Trump's proposed U.S. tariffs on Canadian products in a meeting with American business leaders on Thursday, saying the step would have "negative impacts" on both countries.】

item.title: 中国紫金矿业洽谈收购藏格矿业控股权
item.description: 中国紫金矿业公司周五表示，该公司正在与藏格矿业公司的前两大股东商谈收购该公司潜在控股权的事宜。【原文：China's Zijin Mining said on Friday it was in talks with Zangge Mining's top two shareholders to buy a potential controlling stake in the company.】

item.title: 开发商被申请清盘后，融创中国股价大跌
item.description: 在中国房地产行业遭遇前所未有的债务危机之际，融创中国成为最新一家面临破产清算的公司，在对这家负债累累的开发商提出清算申请后，融创中国股价周五下跌高达 30%。【原文：Sunac China shares dropped as much as 30% on Friday after a liquidation petition was filed against the indebted developer, making it the latest company to face such a move amid an unprecedented debt crisis in China's property sector.】

item.title: 印度股市低开高走，关注 TCS
item.description: 在艰难的一周结束后，印度股市周五将谨慎开盘，外国投资者因担心经济和企业增长放缓而撤出，而 TCS 在这家顶级 IT 公司达到季度利润预期后成为关注焦点。【原文：Indian shares are set for a cautious start on Friday at the end of a tough week in which foreign investors pulled out on fears of slowing economic and corporate growth, with TCS in focus after the top IT firm met quarterly profit estimates.】

item.title: 中国上汽集团将深化与 CATL 在电池和海外扩张方面的合作
item.description: 中国汽车制造商上汽集团周五表示，将深化与电动汽车电池巨头 CATL 的合作，合作领域包括电池零部件后市场和海外业务合作。【原文：Chinese automaker SAIC said on Friday that it will deepen cooperation with electric vehicle battery giant CATL in areas including the battery after market for parts and components and overseas business cooperation.】

item.title: 中国央行以供应短缺为由停止购买国债
item.description: 中国央行周五表示，由于国债供应短缺，决定暂时中止购买国债，这引发了各期限国债收益率的飙升。【原文：China's central bank said on Friday it has decided to suspend treasury bond purchases temporarily due to short supply of the bonds, triggering a jump in yields across tenors.】

item.title: 冬季燃料需求旺盛，石油将连续第三周上涨
item.description: 油价在亚洲早盘交易中上涨，并有望连续第三周上涨，原因是美国和欧洲部分地区的冰雪天气推动了取暖燃料需求的增长。【原文：Oil prices rose in early Asian trade and were on track for a third straight week of gains with icy conditions in parts of the United States and Europe driving up fuel demand for heating.】

item.title: 现代汽车在日本推出售价 1.8 万美元的电动汽车，以打入对电动汽车持谨慎态度的市场
item.description: 韩国现代汽车周五表示，该公司将在日本推出最便宜的紧凑型电动汽车，以打入由当地汽车巨头主导的、拥有成熟油电混合动力汽车技术的市场。【原文：South Korea's Hyundai Motor said on Friday it will introduce the cheapest compact electric car in Japan, to penetrate a market dominated by local auto giants with established hybrid petrol-electric vehicle technologies.】

item.title: 特斯拉在中国推出改款 Model Y，力图击退竞争对手
item.description: 特斯拉周五在中国推出了其最畅销汽车 Model Y 的改款车型，希望座椅加热和更好的音响系统等升级功能能帮助其夺回被小米等竞争对手抢走的市场份额。【原文：Tesla launched a revamped version of the Model Y, its best-selling car, in China on Friday, hoping that upgraded features such as heated seats and a better acoustics system will help it regain market share taken by rivals such as Xiaomi .】

item.title: 消息人士称，马斯克要求各州检察长在非营利机构重组中拍卖 OpenAI 股份
item.description: 熟悉此事的消息人士周四告诉路透社，亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的一名律师已要求加利福尼亚州和特拉华州的司法部长推动 OpenAI 拍卖其业务中的主要股份，以决定其慈善资产在公司重组期间的公平价值。【原文：A lawyer for billionaire Elon Musk has asked attorney generals in the states of California and Delaware to push OpenAI to auction a major stake in its business to decide fair value of its charitable asset during its corporate restructuring, sources familiar with the matter told Reuters on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国就业数据公布前美元涨势扩大
item.description: 周五，美元有望延续一年多来最长的周线连涨势头，这主要是受到债券收益率上升和美国就业数据强劲的预期支撑。【原文：The dollar looked set to extend its longest weekly winning streak in over a year on Friday, underpinned by rising bond yields and expectations of another strong set of U.S. jobs numbers.】

item.title: 南加州断电导致康德摩根燃料管道关闭
item.description: 康德摩根公司（Kinder Morgan Inc）称，由于南加州停电，其两条燃料管道 SFPP West 和 CALNEV 已于 1 月 8 日关闭。【原文：Kinder Morgan Inc said two of its fuel pipelines, SFPP West and CALNEV, have been shut down since Jan. 8 due to power outages in Southern California.】

item.title: 飞机租赁商 Avolon 认为供应问题的影响将持续十年之久
item.description: 全球第二大飞机租赁公司阿沃隆（Avolon）的负责人周五表示，飞机制造商长期存在的产量不足问题将在至少未来十年内支撑航空公司和租赁商利润增长的供需态势。【原文：A long-running production shortfall by planemakers will underpin supply and demand dynamics that are boosting airline and lessor profits for at least another decade, the head of the world's second-largest aircraft leasing company Avolon said on Friday.】

item.title: 美国港口协议或影响未来谈判，工会和雇主都为特朗普点赞
item.description: 一项临时劳资协议避免了美国东海岸和墨西哥湾三十几个港口可能出现的破坏性贸易中断，谈判双方都称赞当选总统唐纳德-特朗普为他们达成自动化协议扫清了道路。【原文：A tentative labor deal forestalled potentially damaging trade disruptions at three-dozen U.S. East Coast and Gulf of Mexico ports, with both sides in the talks crediting President-elect Donald Trump for clearing the way for them to hammer out a deal on automation.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国银行投资银行家的奖金将增加约 10
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，美国银行投资银行家的奖金池可能会比去年增加 10%。【原文：Bank of America's bonus pool for investment bankers will probably rise 10% for last year, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: Glass Lewis 建议空气产品公司的投资者支持 Mantle Ridge 董事会的所有候选人
item.description: 代理咨询公司 Glass Lewis 周四建议空气化工产品公司的投资者选举激进投资者 Mantle Ridge 的全部四名董事会候选人。【原文：Proxy advisory firm Glass Lewis on Thursday recommended that Air Products and Chemicals investors elect all four of activist investor Mantle Ridge's board candidates.】

item.title: 贝莱德寻求将联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）监督银行的最后期限推迟到三月
item.description: 据路透社获得的贝莱德周四发给监管机构的一封信称，贝莱德已要求美国联邦存款保险公司将就该机构如何监管这家巨型资产管理公司在联邦存款保险公司监管下的银行机构的投资达成协议的最后期限从周五延长至 3 月 31 日。【原文：BlackRock has asked the U.S. Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation to extend its deadline to reach an agreement on how the agency would oversee the giant asset manager's investments in FDIC-regulated banking organizations from Friday until March 31, according to a letter the firm sent to regulators on Thursday and obtained by Reuters.】

item.title: 早间投标：全球收益率热降温，但新兴市场条件趋紧
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 百货公司运营商梅西百货将关闭全美部分门店
item.description: 百货公司运营商梅西百货公司（Macy's）周四表示，作为去年宣布的战略的一部分，该公司将关闭 66 家 "非前瞻性 "门店。【原文：Department store operator Macy's said on Thursday it will close 66 "non-go-forward" store locations as part of a strategy it announced last year.】

item.title: 发言人称波音公司将向特朗普总统就职典礼基金捐款 100 万美元
item.description: 波音公司发言人周四表示，波音将向美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的就职典礼捐款100万美元。【原文：Boeing is donating $1 million to U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's inauguration, a spokesperson for the U.S. planemaker said on Thursday.】

item.title: 独家报道美国游说格陵兰稀土开发商坦布雷兹不要卖给中国
item.description: 该公司首席执行官告诉路透社记者，美国和丹麦官员去年曾游说格陵兰岛最大稀土矿藏的开发商不要将其项目出售给与中国有关联的公司。【原文：U.S. and Danish officials lobbied the developer of Greenland's largest rare earths deposit last year not to sell its project to Chinese-linked firms, its CEO told Reuters, adding it has been in regular talks with Washington as it reviews funding options to develop the island's critical minerals.】

item.title: 发言人称雪佛龙公司将向当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的就职委员会捐款
item.description: 美国石油生产商雪佛龙公司发言人周四表示，该公司将向当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的就职典礼基金捐款，但拒绝说明具体数额。【原文：U.S. oil producer Chevron will donate to President-elect Donald Trump's inaugural fund, a company spokesperson said on Thursday, declining to specify the amount.】
